name: Zai
description:
Submitted for BYOG 2022, Zai is a yume nikki-like about finding your bandmates.
The themes used are-
*Makes Total Sense
*It's Not Supposed To Do That
*It Does Sound Like Me

NOTE(Spoilers):
1) The game's ending isn't properly finished yet so consider yourself a success if you find all three members.

2)Some of the sprites are a little out of shape because of webgl compression issues. You can try the PC build for a slightly better visual performance.
